title: Sample Book, 1886–88
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Leather bound notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles. Half of book not used.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1886–88.
1886–88. Medium: leather, paper, cotton. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-19.
